description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Poetical Works of Percy Bysshe Shelley. Edited by Mrs. Shelley. [With portrait and illustrations.]", "Poetical Works" Author: Shelley, Percy Bysshe Contributor: Shelley, Mary Wollstonecraft Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 11611.h.11." Page: 7 Place of Publishing: Philadelphia Date of Publishing: 1884 Publisher: Porter & Coates Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003364108 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
